details: Vite + React base setup, Git initialization, Premium Dark-mode UI design applied.
Remote origin set to https://github.com/kangsubsong76-droid/truebeing-member-app.git, initial push completed.
Supabase client configured, Aligo SMS module prepared, Database schema designed.
Processed 160 members from Entrofit (CSV). Cleaned and normalized data for Supabase.
Successfully uploaded 159 members to live Supabase database after manual schema execution.
